ch.iserver.ace.collaboration
Interface SessionCallback

All Known Subinterfaces:
ParticipantSessionCallback, PublishedSessionCallback
All Known Implementing Classes:
ParticipantSessionCallbackImpl, PublishedSessionCallbackImpl, SessionCallbackImpl
public interface SessionCallback

Callback interface used by sessions to notify the application about events in the session. This interface groups all the operations common to published sessions and participant sessions.

Method Summary
 Lock getLock()
          Gets the lock that should be used by the Session before transforming requests from the network.
 void participantJoined(Participant participant)
          Notifies the session callback that a new user joined the Session.
 void participantLeft(Participant participant, int code)
          Notifies the session callback that a user left the Session.
 void receiveCaretUpdate(Participant participant, CaretUpdate update)
          Receives a caret update from the given participant.
 void receiveOperation(Participant participant, Operation operation)
          Receives an operation from the given participant.
 void sessionFailed(int reason, Exception e)
          Notifies the callback that the session failed.
 void setParticipantId(int participantId)
          Sets the participant id of the local participant.
 

Method Detail

getLock

Lock getLock()
Gets the lock that should be used by the Session before transforming requests from the network.

Returns:
the Lock to guard access to the transformation engine

setParticipantId

void setParticipantId(int participantId)
Sets the participant id of the local participant. This method should be the first called method.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id

participantJoined

void participantJoined(Participant participant)
Notifies the session callback that a new user joined the Session.

Parameters:
participant - the participant that joined

participantLeft

void participantLeft(Participant participant,
                     int code)
Notifies the session callback that a user left the Session.

Parameters:
participant - the participant that left the Session
code - the reason why the participant left

receiveOperation

void receiveOperation(Participant participant,
                      Operation operation)
Receives an operation from the given participant.

Parameters:
participant - the participant that sent the operation
operation - the operation to be applied to the document

receiveCaretUpdate

void receiveCaretUpdate(Participant participant,
                        CaretUpdate update)
Receives a caret update from the given participant.

Parameters:
participant - the participant that sent the CaretUpdate
update - the caret update specification

sessionFailed

void sessionFailed(int reason,
                   Exception e)
Notifies the callback that the session failed. The reason code gives some more detailed information why the session failed.

Parameters:
reason - the reason code (defined in Session interface)
e - the cause of the failure
